title: Chabad Lubavitch Rabbis Delcare Talmudic Noahide Laws in U.S. Se
description: Watch our government be sold out to the sons of the synagogue of Satan. Violation of the 7 Noahide Laws under Talmudic interpretation is death to gentiles. Sanhedrin 57a calls for the decapitation of violators. Of course, Jews can never be violators as the Noahide Laws are only applicable to Gentiles. Currently, Canada and the United States have officially recognized the Talmud Laws.
